packages <- bind_rows(
  packages %>% filter(section != "Other"),
  packages %>% filter(section == "Other"),
)

```{r tables, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
sections <- unique(packages$section)
for(i in seq_along(sections)) {
  packages %>%
    filter(section == sections[i]) %>%
    package_table()
}
```
